title: Typst RPG Character Card Schema
description: A schema to valdidate character.json files to be exported to the RPG character card Typst template.

title.description: The title of the bulleted list. Can be left blank.

items.description: The list of items that will appear on the card. This is where you can put the character's stats, abilities, or other details.

name.description: The name of the item. Can be blank if you don't want the item labelled.

nameSubtext.description: The text that will appear beneath their name. Example: Gender/Race/Class from D&D 5e, or perhaps their title or role.

bodyText.description: The body text that will fill the bulk of the card. This is where you can put the character's backstory, personality, and other details.

image.description: The URL of the image to be used as the character's portrait. Can be a local file path or a web URL.

imageSubtext.description: The subtext that will appear beneath the character's portrait. This is where you can put the character's name, title, or other details.
